qas.question: Which university is the third-largest in the state?
Which private university is located near the Edmond border?

context: The third-largest university in the state, the <a0_0>University of Central Oklahoma<a0_0/>, is located just north of the city in the suburb of Edmond. <a1_0>Oklahoma Christian University<a1_0/>, one of the state's private liberal arts institutions, is located just south of the Edmond border, inside the Oklahoma City limits.
